Subject: Re: [junit] Complex test process
From: Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@...>

Maybe I'm not getting your point but why don't you simply write a (ant) script to
1) generate and compiles the files
2) deploy the files
3) exercize the service
4) undeploy the files

(If I understand you right, you want to use the JUnit's setUp method for 1) 2) and 4).)

> I will have to force the order
> of the deploy/undeploy, but I want them counted
> as part of the test.

Ask yourself: "What are you testing?" The service or the generation of the service?

My 2 cents

-Vladimir
subject: Re: [junit] Complex test process
